headline: Berkshire Hathaway: Buffett Sells Banks, Buys Beer And Pizza As Economic Indicators Worsen
summary: Warren Buffett has sold record amounts of stock over the past 18 months but hasn't given the public much information as to why. Read more on the inflation-resistant picks made by Berkshire.
